plot.title: Catalogd heap space usage
plot.tsquery: SELECT impala_catalogserver_jvm_heap_current_usage_bytes WHERE entityName = "impala-CATALOGSERVER-321816b644ec79141f987753a4e7b9ed" AND category = ROLE

plot.description: The total network read and write IO, in bytes, across all the host's network interfaces.
plot.title: Catalogd Host Network Throughput

plot.description: Role CPU usage broken into user and system usage.
plot.title: Catalogd CPU usage
plot.tsquery: select cpu_user_rate / getHostFact(numCores, 1) * 100, cpu_system_rate / getHostFact(numCores, 1) * 100 where entityName="impala-CATALOGSERVER-321816b644ec79141f987753a4e7b9ed"

plot.title: Catalogd RSS memory
plot.tsquery: SELECT mem_rss WHERE entityName = "impala-CATALOGSERVER-321816b644ec79141f987753a4e7b9ed" AND category = ROLE

plot.description: The sum of the size of all keys and all values for all topics tracked by the StateStore.
plot.title: Statestored topic size
plot.tsquery: SELECT statestore_total_topic_size_bytes WHERE entityName = "impala-STATESTORE-321816b644ec79141f987753a4e7b9ed" AND category = ROLE

plot.description: The total network read and write IO, in bytes, across all the host's network interfaces.
plot.title: Statestored host network throughput

plot.description: Role CPU usage broken into user and system usage.
plot.title: Namenode rpc workload summary
plot.tsquery: SELECT get_block_locations_rate, get_file_info_rate, get_listing_rate  WHERE roleType = "NAMENODE"

plot.description: Role CPU usage broken into user and system usage.
plot.title: Namenode RPC queue and processing time
Namenode GC latency
plot.tsquery: SELECT integral(jvm_gc_time_ms_rate) WHERE entityName = "hdfs-NAMENODE-d771be5050c312883b0e70d33644777b" AND category = ROLE
